website_summaries.verdict: Nicely made basic tools in this smaller set.
pros: Gives you all the basics in a set
Can also be a good add-on kit for someone who has already gotten started in leatherworking
cons: The stamps could be of higher quality, but they work great for a beginner

customer_reviews.title: A good starters kit.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the tool are a little cheaply made but in general they work and get the job done. I've been using them for a while now and don't have any real complaints. A good start but at some point you are going to feel the need to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Segal

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the pricepoint
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set for beginners. Lote of tools "I" probably wont use but others may. Only wish the beveler tool was a bit smaller but that is because i do many details.
customer_reviews.author: Casner

customer_reviews.title: For the beginner
customer_reviews.text: My husband is just starting out and the set had all the basics he needed and they’re nicely mad tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great beginner's set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner's set. The swivel knife is an accurate, easy to use jewel, and the stylus set is great for tracing patterns and transferring them to the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Scout

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners set
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the price. Not the highest quality stamps, but the maul and the swivel knife almost justify the price by themselves, making all the stamps a nice extra.
customer_reviews.author: Dan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great collection
customer_reviews.text: Just about everything you'll need to start and grow into.
customer_reviews.author: tb399

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, comprehensive, and reasonably priced leatherworking set. Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, can't beat the price the stamps are however, knock offs of Tandy stamps but they work.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit or a great add on to what you have
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Good price, but the shipping time was a bit long--I think it was an overseas order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. Not happy at all. Quality is garbage but the real deal the first time
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Product seems to be ok quality some of the tools ...
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be ok quality some of the tools had some oxidation I was able to polish it off though.
customer_reviews.author: CANAAN J RAMON

customer_reviews.title: You would certainly pay more for good tools
customer_reviews.text: I was greatly disappointed in the quality of the red handled tools. the metal is so thick it will be difficult to put an edge on it for undercutting. The wooden handle tools seems like there's four of the same thing when they're a little different but not enough to justify why there's four of them instead of four completely different tools. The swivel knife looks very good. The mallet it's got some good weight to it and seems like it'll be good. The punch tools for pet making patterns and whatnot with the mallet look like they're adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for beginner
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of tools for someone getting into leather working. I love the maul as it’s perfectly sized and weighted for my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Not the most crisp stamps, but the rest of the tools are good quailty
customer_reviews.author: Kent G.

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: The mallet requires frequent retightening but overall not bad, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joeshooter

customer_reviews.title: Anyone wanting to give leather carving a try, get this kit!
customer_reviews.text: I am just learning leather carving and I really like this kit. Good quality products for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a must for any leather crafter
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but 8t was exactly what he needed. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: BARB

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stamps we're good. The cutting tool was not sharp enough though
customer_reviews.author: GR8play30

product_meta.title: AMPSEVEN 20pcs Leather Carving Working Saddle Making Tools Set DIY Hammer Swivel Knife Leather Craft Modelling Pen & Dual Tipped Leather Craft Tool Modeling Point Pen
feature_bullets: 1.Note: Economic sets suit for beginner,not for perfectionist/extremist.
2.Tools for your leather carving. You can using this to create your own design, your own logo, great tools for your art work. very easy to using.
3.Great for carving intricate patterns in your leather.
4.DIY Leather Craft Stamps Set help you to make your leather wallet, belt or bag more beautiful and unique.
5.Packing: 20 X Saddle Making Tool. 1 x Hammer. 1 x Carving Knife. 3 x Leather Craft Modelling Pen.5 x Tracing pen

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars63 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
